Title: Manan Kevadiya | Personal Webpage
Name: Manan Kevadiya
Description: I self-taught developer. Passionate about Web Development, UI/UX designing and Gaming.
I grab every chance I get to code, learn and create.
AboutContent: I’m a Engineering student by day, a football player by evening, a functional wantrepreneur by midnight and a hustler always.
If you can’t find me, it’s because I’m already playing video-game, reading a book, watching anime or studying for an exam
I am passionate about Web Development and Human Psychology (though, never studied them formally). A die-hard fan of Elon Musk.
WorkContent: I am currently full time Software Developer Engineer at Microsoft.
